creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black square shape with long string ties; reversible; one side has rows of cross stitch embroidery on bottom in pink and purple, primarily, with metal accents; other side has silk applique bands in red, green and pink on bottom and cotton applique bands in red and blue at top
dimension: 21 3/4 x 23 in. (55.25 x 58.42 cm) (width at waist)
title: Apron, from a three-piece set
